roleset.name: to stop, slow up or control

example.name: autogen1
example.text: Mr. Dozen is taking over the reins of a securities company that does very well in its domestic market but that is still seeking to realize its potential in global investment banking and securities dealing .
example.arg: of a securities company that does very well in its domestic market but that is still seeking to realize its potential in global investment banking and securities dealing

example.name: autogen2
example.text: he handed over the reins to successor Charles A. Corry
